annotation.spannedText: Fears over the safety of vaccines are understandable

classMention.mentionClass: Fears over the safety of vaccines are understandable

annotation.spannedText: These eight major vaccine myths that research has shown to be baseless

classMention.mentionClass: These eight major vaccine myths that research has shown to be baseless

annotation.spannedText: Research ... shows that most of our biggest fears about vaccinations are unfounded

classMention.mentionClass: Research ... shows that most of our biggest fears about vaccinations are unfounded

annotation.spannedText: the true causes of autism remain a mystery, but to the discredit of the autism-vaccination link theory, several studies have now identified symptoms of autism in children well before they receive the MMR vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: the true causes of autism remain a mystery, but to the discredit of the autism-vaccination link theory, several studies have now identified symptoms of autism in children well before they receive the MMR vaccine

annotation.spannedText: even more recent research provides evidence that autism develops in utero, well before a baby is born or receives vaccinations

classMention.mentionClass: even more recent research provides evidence that autism develops in utero, well before a baby is born or receives vaccinations

annotation.spannedText: Infant immune systems are stronger than you might think

classMention.mentionClass: Infant immune systems are stronger than you might think

annotation.spannedText: The immune system could never truly be overwhelmed because the cells in the system are constantly being replenished

classMention.mentionClass: The immune system could never truly be overwhelmed because the cells in the system are constantly being replenished

annotation.spannedText: In reality, babies are exposed to countless bacteria and viruses every day, and immunizations are negligible in comparison

classMention.mentionClass: In reality, babies are exposed to countless bacteria and viruses every day, and immunizations are negligible in comparison

annotation.spannedText: Though there are more vaccinations than ever before, today’s vaccines are far more efficient

classMention.mentionClass: Though there are more vaccinations than ever before, today’s vaccines are far more efficient

annotation.spannedText: Small children are actually exposed to fewer immunologic components overall than children in past decades

classMention.mentionClass: Small children are actually exposed to fewer immunologic components overall than children in past decades

annotation.spannedText: In some cases, natural immunity — meaning actually catching a disease and getting sick– results in a stronger immunity to the disease than a vaccination

classMention.mentionClass: In some cases, natural immunity — meaning actually catching a disease and getting sick– results in a stronger immunity to the disease than a vaccination

annotation.spannedText: the dangers of this approach far outweigh the relative benefits

classMention.mentionClass: the dangers of this approach far outweigh the relative benefits

annotation.spannedText: It’s true that these chemicals are toxic to the human body in certain levels, but only trace amounts of these chemicals are used in FDA approved vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: It’s true that these chemicals are toxic to the human body in certain levels, but only trace amounts of these chemicals are used in FDA approved vaccines

annotation.spannedText: formaldehyde is produced at higher rates by our own metabolic systems and there is no scientific evidence that the low levels of this chemical, mercury or aluminum in vaccines can be harmful

classMention.mentionClass: formaldehyde is produced at higher rates by our own metabolic systems and there is no scientific evidence that the low levels of this chemical, mercury or aluminum in vaccines can be harmful

annotation.spannedText: the FDA and the CDC

classMention.mentionClass: the FDA and the CDC

annotation.spannedText: Better hygiene and sanitation are actually responsible for decreased infections, not vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: Better hygiene and sanitation are actually responsible for decreased infections, not vaccines

annotation.spannedText: Myth

classMention.mentionClass: Myth

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines don’t deserve all the credit for reducing or eliminating rates of infectious disease

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines don’t deserve all the credit for reducing or eliminating rates of infectious disease

annotation.spannedText: Better sanitation, nutrition, and the development of antibiotics helped a lot too

classMention.mentionClass: Better sanitation, nutrition, and the development of antibiotics helped a lot too

annotation.spannedText: when these factors are isolated and rates of infectious disease are scrutinized, the role of vaccines cannot be denied

classMention.mentionClass: when these factors are isolated and rates of infectious disease are scrutinized, the role of vaccines cannot be denied

annotation.spannedText: there has never been a single credible study linking vaccines to long term health conditions

classMention.mentionClass: there has never been a single credible study linking vaccines to long term health conditions

annotation.spannedText: Despite parent concerns, children have been successfully vaccinated for decades

classMention.mentionClass: Despite parent concerns, children have been successfully vaccinated for decades

annotation.spannedText: As for immediate danger from vaccines, in the form of allergic reactions or severe side effects, the incidence of death are so rare they can’t even truly be calculated

classMention.mentionClass: As for immediate danger from vaccines, in the form of allergic reactions or severe side effects, the incidence of death are so rare they can’t even truly be calculated

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines can cause mild symptoms resembling those of the disease they are protecting against

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines can cause mild symptoms resembling those of the disease they are protecting against

annotation.spannedText: A common misconception is that these symptoms signal infection

classMention.mentionClass: A common misconception is that these symptoms signal infection

annotation.spannedText: There is only one recorded instance in which a vaccine was shown to cause disease

classMention.mentionClass: There is only one recorded instance in which a vaccine was shown to cause disease

annotation.spannedText: vaccines have been in safe use for decades and follow strict Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulations

classMention.mentionClass: vaccines have been in safe use for decades and follow strict Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulations

annotation.spannedText: Thanks to “herd immunity,” so long as a large majority of people are immunized in any population, even the unimmunized minority will be protected

classMention.mentionClass: Thanks to “herd immunity,” so long as a large majority of people are immunized in any population, even the unimmunized minority will be protected

annotation.spannedText: This is important because there will always be a portion of the population – infants, pregnant women, elderly, and those with weakened immune systems – that can’t receive vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: This is important because there will always be a portion of the population – infants, pregnant women, elderly, and those with weakened immune systems – that can’t receive vaccines

annotation.spannedText: With so many people resistant, an infectious disease will never get a chance to establish itself and spread

classMention.mentionClass: With so many people resistant, an infectious disease will never get a chance to establish itself and spread

annotation.spannedText: if too many people don’t vaccinate themselves or their children, they contribute to a collective danger, opening up opportunities for viruses and bacteria to establish themselves and spread

classMention.mentionClass: if too many people don’t vaccinate themselves or their children, they contribute to a collective danger, opening up opportunities for viruses and bacteria to establish themselves and spread

annotation.spannedText: If someone were to carry in a disease from abroad, an unvaccinated individual will be at far greater risk of getting sick if he or she is exposed

classMention.mentionClass: If someone were to carry in a disease from abroad, an unvaccinated individual will be at far greater risk of getting sick if he or she is exposed

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are one of the great pillars of modern medicine

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are one of the great pillars of modern medicine

annotation.spannedText: Life used to be especially brutal for children before vaccines, with huge portions being felled by diseases like measles, smallpox, whooping cough, or rubella, to name just a few

classMention.mentionClass: Life used to be especially brutal for children before vaccines, with huge portions being felled by diseases like measles, smallpox, whooping cough, or rubella, to name just a few

annotation.spannedText: Today these ailments can be completely prevented with a simple injection

classMention.mentionClass: Today these ailments can be completely prevented with a simple injection

annotation.spannedText: as science continues to advance and tackle new challenges, people should not forget how many deaths and illnesses vaccines have prevented, and how they continue to protect us from potentially devastating forms of infectious disease.

classMention.mentionClass: as science continues to advance and tackle new challenges, people should not forget how many deaths and illnesses vaccines have prevented, and how they continue to protect us from potentially devastating forms of infectious disease.

annotation.spannedText: Myth #1: Vaccines cause autism

classMention.mentionClass: Myth #1: Vaccines cause autism

annotation.spannedText: Myth #2: Infant immune systems can’t handle so many vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: Myth #2: Infant immune systems can’t handle so many vaccines

annotation.spannedText: Myth #3: Natural immunity is better than vaccine-acquired immunity

classMention.mentionClass: Myth #3: Natural immunity is better than vaccine-acquired immunity

annotation.spannedText: Myth #4: Vaccines contain unsafe toxins

classMention.mentionClass: Myth #4: Vaccines contain unsafe toxins

annotation.spannedText: Myth #6: Vaccines aren’t worth the risk

classMention.mentionClass: Myth #6: Vaccines aren’t worth the risk

annotation.spannedText: Myth #8: We don’t need to vaccinate because infection rates are already so low in the United States
